Waiting for the end of long session: Waiting for the end of long session

Can not start validation session because: Can not start validation session because you did not activate invite
Can not start validation session because you did not submit flips.
Please check your local clock. The time: Please check your local clock. The time must be synchronized with internet time in order to have connections with other peers.
You can also submit optional flips if yo: You can also submit {{remainingOptionalFlips}} optional flips if you want.
Think up a short story about someone/som: Think up a short story about someone/something related to the two key words below according to the template "Before — Something happens — After"
Use key words for the story: Use key words for the story
You can not submit flips. Please get val: You can not submit flips. Please get validated first.
Your node was offline more than 1 hour. The penalty will be charged automaically. Once it's fully paid you'll continue to mine coins.
Since invitation codes are supposed to b:
Since invitation codes are supposed to be provided privately feel free
          to spoil those invitations that are shared publicly. This will prevent
          bots from collecting invitation codes. When you click Spoil the
          invitation will be activated by a random address
You can issue the invitation to the spec: You can issue the invitation to the specific identity address in Advanced section
Are both keywords relevant to the flip?: Are both keywords relevant to the flip?
Can not load the flip keywords to modera: Can not load the flip keywords to moderate the story. Please wait or skip this flip.
Solve more than 12 flips to become Verif: Solve more than 12 flips to become Verified
Select meaningful story: left or right: Select meaningful story: left or right
Spoil invitations that are shared public: Spoil invitations that are shared publicly. This will encourage people to share invitations privately and prevent bots from collecting invitation codes.
When you click 'Spoil' the invitation co: When you click 'Spoil' the invitation code will be activated by a random address and wasted.
Submit the form to start mining. Your no:
Submit the form to start mining. Your node has to be online
              unless you deactivate your status. Otherwise penalties might be
              charged after being offline more than 1 hour.
Your answers for the validation session: Your answers for the validation session have been submitted successfully!
Now solve bunch of flips to check its qu:
Now solve bunch of flips to check its quality. The flip is qualified
            if the majority, equals more than 2/3 participants, gives the same
            answer.
Your answers are not yet submitted: Your answers are not yet submitted
Please qualify the keywords relevance an: Please qualify the keywords relevance and submit the answers.
The flips with irrelevant keywords will: The flips with irrelevant keywords will be penalized.
An error occured while submitting your a: An error occured while submitting your answers.
Your answers for the qualification sessi:
Your answers for the qualification session have been submited
          successfully!
Please wait for the validation results. It will take some time for
          network to reach consensus about the list of validated accounts. You
          can find the validation end time on the left panel.
Sorry your answers won’t be submitted si:
Sorry your answers won’t be submitted since the validation session is
          over.
You must specify your own identity addre: You must specify your own identity address
Please enter your identity address to co: Please enter your identity address to confirm termination. Stake will be transferred to the identity address.
You’re about to send iDNA from your wall: You’re about to send iDNA from your wallet to the following address

Wait for validation or create {{count}} optional flips
Please remove Report status from some ot: Please remove Report status from some other flips to continue
You'll get a reward if the flip is repor: You'll get a reward if the flip is reported by other participants
Please also report the flip when you see: Please also report the flip when you see one of the following:
You need to read the text in the flip to: You need to read the text in the flip to solve it
You see numbers or letters or other labe: You see numbers or letters or other labels on top of the images showing their order
Skip the flip if the keywords are not lo: Skip the flip if the keywords are not loaded
Please report the flip when you see one: Please report the flip when you see one of the following:
One of the keywords is not relevant to t: One of the keywords is not relevant to the flip
You'll get a reward for the reported fli: You'll get a reward for the reported flip if the flip is also reported by other participants
You may lose rewards. Are you sure?: You may lose rewards. Are you sure?
reviewMissingFlips: You need to answer <2>all flips</2> otherwise you may fail the validation.
reviewMissingReports: In order to get maximum rewards use <2>all available reports</2>.
